meanings.definition: To create new words or expressions.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys neologizing by coming up with fun words to use with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The author is neologizing to add a fresh touch to her writing.
meanings.sent3: Neologizing can be a fun way to spice up conversations.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a neologizing machine, constantly churning out new terms.
meanings.sent5: Neologizing is like painting with words, creating colorful linguistic masterpieces.

meanings.definition: The act of inventing new words or phrases.
meanings.sent1: His neologizing has brought some interesting additions to the dictionary.
meanings.sent2: Neologizing is a creative process that adds richness to language.
meanings.sent3: The neologizing contest at the school was a hit among students.
meanings.sent4: In the world of neologizing, imagination knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The neologizing of Shakespeare revolutionized the English language.
